Sid's Fried Chicken is a premier food service business that offers an exceptional culinary experience to its customers. Our mission is to provide crispy and flavorful fried chicken that is made using only high-quality, fresh chicken and marinated in a blend of spices that have been specially curated by Chef Sid. We believe in the importance of attention to detail, consistency in cooking, and a commitment to using fresh ingredients and quality spices.

In addition to our signature fried chicken, we offer a range of other delicious dishes with hints of Indian flavors, including Butter Chicken and Tandoori Chicken. Our menu is carefully crafted to provide a unique and delightful taste that keeps our customers coming back for more.

At Sid's Fried Chicken, we take pride in our professionalism and strive to create an exceptional experience for our customers. Our team is dedicated to providing top-notch customer service, and we are committed to maintaining high standards in all aspects of our business operations.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Primerose Mediterranean Restaurant was established in Delta back in 1997. Since then it has become a tradition in the community and a place where friends and families come together to celebrate and make new memories.

In December 2015, the torch was passed on to a new family. Sia, Maria and their young daughter Georgia took over the Primerose with a vision to continue the rich tradition of offering locally sourced, fresh Greek/Mediterranean cuisine using secret family recipes direct from Greece.

Long time residents of Delta, Sia & Maria have been a very active members of the Delta community for many years and in fact Sia is the current volunteer chair of the Delta Relay for Life in support of the Canadian Cancer Society. During our many years involvement with the Delta Relay for Life, we have helped raise over $150,000 towards the fight against cancer.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Authentic taste of Greek/Mediterranean cuisine. Fresh, delicious and warm family atmosphere.

A social enterprise, Taste of Heaven delivers delicious street style food to special functions, job sites and festivals all over Metro Vancouver. Taste of Heaven serves the perfect street fare: locally made gourmet sausages, served on a bun with freshly prepared condiments, locally crafted potato chips and hand-brewed sodas.

Every meal purchased at Taste of Heaven helps NightShift Street Ministries reach out to people battling life's toughest situations: homelessness, addiction, mental illness and poverty.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Primerose Mediterranean Restaurant was established in Delta back in 1997. Since then it has become a tradition in the community and a place where friends and families come together to celebrate and make new memories.

In December 2015, the torch was passed on to a new family. Sia, Maria and their young daughter Georgia took over the Primerose with a vision to continue the rich tradition of offering locally sourced, fresh Greek/Mediterranean cuisine using secret family recipes direct from Greece.

Long time residents of Delta, Sia & Maria have been a very active members of the Delta community for many years and in fact Sia is the current volunteer chair of the Delta Relay for Life in support of the Canadian Cancer Society. During our many years involvement with the Delta Relay for Life, we have helped raise over $150,000 towards the fight against cancer.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Authentic taste of Greek/Mediterranean cuisine. Fresh, delicious and warm family atmosphere.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Bánh Mì Très Bon was created and established on October 29th, 2016. Bánh Mì Très Bon started their ambitious goal of sharing healthy, and undiscovered items from Vietnam to the western world. There was promising feedback from the community within a short period of time. Just after a year, Bánh Mì Très Bon was recognized by the Vancouver Magazine Awards as one of the best Vietnamese restaurant in the lower mainland. Bánh Mì Très Bon stayed different but true to themselves with their service, quality, and community. An expansion project is due before the end of 2019.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Bánh Mì Très Bon is driven and passionate to reintroduce Vietnamese cuisine the way it was meant to be enjoyed in Vietnam. Using fresh and local ingredients, Bánh Mì Très Bon articulates detail, quality, and a community. Our beef noodle soup or ph tái bò viên is a favorite among an array of finely crafted dishes. Many of customers of Bánh Mì Très Bon express that there is a very quaint homestyle and cozy feeling in the restaurant. Food just isn't the same without good company. Whether with friends, family, colleagues, or alone, Bánh Mì Très Bon will always make you feel at home.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Family-owned and operated, staying true to Japanese roots and flavours.

TSUJIRI was founded in 1860 by Tsuji Riemon who was renowned for his spirit of "YUWA", which means bringing innovation into the tradition. His statue was built in Kyoto, Japan to honour his contribution to the Japanese tea industry. Mr. Tsuji has refined the cultivation of Gyokuro (the highest grade of Japanese green tea) and his method is still being used to this day. He is also the
inventor of the tea box that preserves the longevity and freshness of the tea leaves during transportation, making fresh tea fromKyoto available to other Japanese cities a century ago. In 2010, CHAHO, which means tea shop in Japanese, were first establishedoutside of Japan to carry on our founder's spirit and to serve fresh tea to our customers worldwide.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Japanese matcha and green tea infused fusion restaurant

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Some 30 years ago, Leroy Earl Fuller and his son Stanley Earl Fuller had a simple idea: a laid-back burger & beer joint. When the restaurant started, there was no question about what the name would be. It had to be called Earls. The restaurant quickly took off because, well, who would say no to burgers & beer? So they hired talented people and travelled the world to taste, drink and get inspired. Then they came back and applied all of that to the menu. And with that came attention and awards and even more talented people. A lot has changed since those early days. But Earls is still a family business. And itïs filled with people who are genuinely passionate about great food and drinks served in an inviting environment.

Our seafood bar has a good variety of fresh oysters sourced from Canada and USA. To have a taste of Japan, we have nicely decorated sashimi and sushi with the more premium seafood imported from Japan. The selection varies depending on the availability and season. 

Whether you would like to start off your meal with some bites of snacks and appetizers with a good selection of Japanese wine, liquor, cocktails, and beer, or you would like to finish it off with noodles and don, we have enough items to meet your appetite.

Our focus has always been on 3 basic principles:

Make a good quality product
Provide it at a fair price
And, never compromise your reputation

Our catering clients are looking for healthy home meal replacements and variety in our menus, which is exactly what we provide. We showcase our knowledge in kosher cuisine for all type of events, and for corporate clients, to create an endless variety of menu items related to your theme.
Catering doesn't have to be exclusively for special occasions anymore.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

A social enterprise, Taste of Heaven delivers delicious street style food to special functions, job sites and festivals all over Metro Vancouver. Taste of Heaven serves the perfect street fare: locally made gourmet sausages, served on a bun with freshly prepared condiments, locally crafted potato chips and hand-brewed sodas.

Every meal purchased at Taste of Heaven helps NightShift Street Ministries reach out to people battling life's toughest situations: homelessness, addiction, mental illness and poverty.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: William A. immigrated to Vancouver, Canada in 1988 from Indonesia. His parents were always business minded and later trickled down to him. He always had a heart for good food, and tinkered with new creations himself. After moving to California for high school, college, and 5 years in sales for a manufacturer of hardwood flooring he decided to move back to his hometown. William loves KBBQ, especially the all you can eat ones. LOL. He certainly loves Poutine. He brought both worlds together in his tastiest creation. Stay tuned for more crazy and mouth watering creations!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our humble story. It all started with 2 men, one just immigrated from the Philippines with his family, the other moved back from California to his hometown, Vancouver. 2 guys met each other working in sales at a car dealership (we won't mention which one) and management was just horrendous. We kept saying to each other, "we need to start a business ourselves." After weeks of brainstorming, our mouth watered as we thought about Korean BBQ topped over Poutine. We knew it was a hit, blending comfort foods of both countries and colliding into a tasty creation. As a small business we decided to get the word out by starting small at a local night market, Summer Night Market in Richmond. After the first weekend, we got so many thumbs we were delighted! O.M.G.!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We bring the best comfort foods of Canada and Korea in this amazing creation called Korean Barbecue Poutine. Freshly marinated beef Kalbi (beef short rib), Bulgogi (sliced beef), Chicken Bulgogi (chicken thigh) and Pork Bulgogi (sliced pork) grilled to perfection topped over POUTINE! Its so good its O.M.G.
